query:

ADD COLUMN remoteSiteFeeKm VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN remoteSiteFeeCustomerCents INT,
ADD COLUMN remoteSiteFeeSupplierCents INT,
ADD COLUMN remoteSiteFeePlatformCents INT,
ADD COLUMN nearestMajorCity VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN distanceToMajorCityKm VARCHAR(20);
